text: The beauty we love is very silent. It smiles softly to itself, but never speaks.
author: Richard Le Gallienne

text: We also maintain - again with perfect truth - that mystery is more than half of beauty, the element of strangeness that stirs the senses through the imagination.
author: Richard Le Gallienne

text: A woman's beauty is one of her great missions.
author: Richard Le Gallienne

text: I've developed into quite a swan. I'm one of those people that will probably look better and better as I get older until I drop dead of beauty.
author: Rufus Wainwright

text: I appreciate simplicity, true beauty that lasts over time, and a little wit and eclecticism that make life more fun.
author: Elliott Erwitt
